Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Troy in 1984...
Injured on 5/1/1984 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/1987 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Injured on 4/18/1989 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Released by Troy on 9/1/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1990 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit on 4/15/1990, off Pedro Manzano (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/21/1990, off Perry Drennon (BC)...
Injured on 4/2/1991 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Released by Capital City on 9/8/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/16/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $405,900 per year...
Injured on 4/11/1992 with a Bruised Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
